Key Arguments: The government should not control or limit what people can say or believe.
The role of government is to ensure fairness and provide essential services, not to dictate truth.
Over-regulation stifles innovation and creates division.
The proposed legislation exempts the government from the rules it imposes on citizens, which is unfair.
Distrust in government due to past misinformation, particularly regarding Covid-19 vaccines.
Notable Quotes: The government is not the owner of truth and therefore how can it say to the people, 'this is truth' or 'this is false'?
This proposed legislation seeks to exacerbate this problem!
How can we trust any government to know and tell the truth when we have so many examples of governments here giving false information?!
